json.text: I have three sisters and so I would always steal all my sisters shoes
my older sister in particular had amazing taste so I would borrow her shoes and stuff the toes
with Kleenex and I would forget to take the kleenex out every now and then and she would
catch me and know that I stole her shoes and it was like World War III, so that, and now it's the reverse
now she steals my shoes so, we're even.
I, honestly, am addicted to my crisp white sneakers, these, these are my go-to
I really, they're really comfortable. So I just, I live in them.
Yes. I luckily have the same size foot as quite a few of my girlfriends so
that comes in handy, we raid each other's closets.
I think the most important quality in a runway walk is, or even if you'd just walking down the street is how
you hold yourself. It's really like that confidence that, on a runway you want to
exude confidence even if you're nervous about the high heels or you're, whatever is
going through your head it's really a matter of like, faking it 'til you make it, and really exuding confidence.
So I just started at NYU this year and have not picked my major yet but
you'll be the first to know.
I am really excited about this initiative that I'm working on for this summer
which is called "Kode with Klossy" and basically we are offering scholarships for young
women to learn how to code which I think is an invaluable skill set.
Well, so far, in my experience as a college student the best things are the discount you get
like a 10% discount at, like, a lot of really convenient places, and the worst thing
is just the late nights. I work long days and do my homework after work, so I that, I'd have to say,
those late nights are not fun. They're cutting in on my beauty sleep.
I, I wear to class same thing I wear to work you know my style is really
really I'd like to say chic but simple and comfortable at the end of the day so I wear my Adidas trainers
and you know, cute skinny jeans or, or kind of a simple dress and like a leather
jacket or something kind of, just, I stick to my staples.
Sneakers.
Run
From this chair. [laughs]
Less is more.
#YOLO
I plan on finding like, the best dessert in this town and like taking some home and eating lots of it.
